parameters.name: CookieName
parameters.description: The name of the custom cookie.

parameters.name: CustomPageHtml
parameters.description: The content of the custom waiting room page. You must specify this parameter if you set WaitingRoomType to custom. The content must be Base64-encoded.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the waiting room.

parameters.name: DisableSessionRenewalEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to disable session renewal. Valid values:

*   on
*   off

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the waiting room. Valid values:

*   on
*   off

parameters.name: JsonResponseEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable JSON response. If you set this parameter to on, a JSON body is returned for requests to the waiting room with the header Accept: application/json. Valid values:

*   on
*   off

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description:
The language of the waiting room page. You must specify this parameter if you set WaitingRoomType to default. Valid values:

*   enus: English.
*   zhcn: Simplified Chinese.
*   zhhk: Traditional Chinese.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the waiting room.

parameters.name: NewUsersPerMinute
parameters.description: The maximum number of new users per minute.

parameters.name: QueueAllEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to queue all requests. Valid values:

*   on
*   off

parameters.name: QueuingMethod
parameters.description:
The queuing method. Valid values:

*   random: Users gain access to the origin randomly, regardless of the arrival time.
*   fifo: Users gain access to the origin in order of arrival.
*   passthrough: Users pass through the waiting room and go straight to the origin.
*   reject-all: Users are blocked from reaching the origin.

parameters.name: QueuingStatusCode
parameters.description:
The HTTP status code to return while a user is in the queue. Valid values:

*   200
*   202
*   429

parameters.name: SessionDuration
parameters.description: The maximum duration for which a session remains valid after a user leaves the origin. Unit: minutes.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.

parameters.name: TotalActiveUsers
parameters.description: The maximum number of active users.

parameters.name: WaitingRoomType
parameters.description:
The type of the waiting room. Valid values:

*   default
*   custom
